resources.string:
Maharaja Agrasen Institute of Technology (MAIT) is a public–private partnership engineering college, located in New Delhi, India. MAIT has 10 departments (Five-Engineering, Four-Research and Three-Auxiliary). It is affiliated to the Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University.Maharaja Agrasen Institute of Technology (MAIT) is a public–private partnership engineering college, located in New Delhi, India. MAIT has 10 departments (Five-Engineering, Four-Research and Three-Auxiliary). It is affiliated to the Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University.\n\n" The MAIT campus is located in Rohini Sector-22, North Delhi, spread over an area of 40.5 acres (164,000 m2).
The campus has 12 blocks namely:
Block 1: Aryabhatt Block: For Computer Science Engineering (CSE) Department Block 2: Brahmgupt Block : For Mechanical and Automation Engineering(MAE) Department Block 3: Dr. C.V. Raman Block: For Law Department Block 4: Guru Dronacharya Block: For Electronics and Communication Engineering(ECE) Department Block 5: For BBA and MBA (MAIMS) Department Block 6: Mahatma Gandhi Block: For Electronics and Electrical Engineering (EEE) Department Block 7: Subhash Chandra Bose Block: For BJMC Department Block 8: Rabindra Nath Tagore Block: For Information Technology(IT) Department Block 9: Ram Gopal Verma Block: For 1st year B.Tech. students (common) Administrative Block Library Main Auditorium: The auditorium is near by entrance gate. There is also mini-auditorium in the campus." "
